name: df-staf
body: |- wceq(cstf, cmpt(s0, universe, cmpt(s1, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), cfv(cfv(cstv, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))))
comment: Define the functionalization of the involution in a star ring. This is not strictly necessary but by having ` *r ` as an actual function we can state the principal properties of an involution much more cleanly. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-Oct-2015.)
